description:
Montreal, March 10, 2014 - Brydon Gilliss, founder of the hockey startup 20Skaters.com based in Guelph, Ontario, invites Python folks from the Toronto area to join him for a social train ride to PyCon 2014 and 2015 in Montreal.

* Python On Rails: http://pythononrails.ca/
* Brydon: http://brydon.me/
* MP44: http://sflx.ca/mp44e
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: Python On Rails ⇝ Snakes On A Train #MP44
